name: PowerRouter
headline: PowerRouter helps sales teams with lead routing in Salesforce
description: PowerRouter helps sales teams assign leads and contacts to the right reps, instantly within Salesforce.  We provide a powerful automation engine with a drag and drop canvas to create routing rules, visually.  With actionable metrics to increase speed-to-lead and account based sales support, we make it very simple to stay on top of every lead in your Salesforce CRM.

# Simplified pipeline assignments Maximized revenue efficiency
## Effortlessly create, manage, and optimize routing workflows with simple drag-and-drop interface, the quick and easy way. 
[ Book a Demo ](https://www.powerrouter.io/<https:/powerrouter.io/free-demo/>)
![](https://powerrouter.io/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/PowerRouter.webp)
## The go-to-choice of today's modern revenue teams
## See how companies use PowerRouter to unlock their revenue potential 
![](https://powerrouter.io/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/1553023609263-removebg-preview.png)
## PowerRouter has helped us solve one of our important business needs in Salesforce. This tool ended up solving our round robin needs flawlessly!
## Edward Glenbockie
## Sales Operations Manager, Emtrain.
![](https://powerrouter.io/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/8b027433ec0536877de6ce94620ad418-1.png)
## "PowerRouter is the best lead routing tool in the industry right now. It effortlessly simplifies our MQL-based lead routing workflows, reducing MQL leakage by 80%. We rely on PowerRouter for all our lead routing needs to ensure the leads land in the hands of the right sales teams."
## Nick Lauricella
## Sr. Marketing Operations Manager, Cockroach Labs
![](https://powerrouter.io/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/1673982783443-removebg-preview.png)
## "PowerRouter has changed how we handle lead routing, boosting our efficiency significantly. Integrated with Salesforce, it ensures accurate and fair lead distribution, improving operational accuracy. The streamlined routing also enhances sales process efficiency, freeing up time for lead engagement and simplifying productivity. Highly recommended for any business looking to optimize their conversion, accuracy, efficiency, and management." 
## Austin Walter
## Revenue Operations Manager, ShipBob 
![](https://powerrouter.io/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/529699-large__1_-removebg-preview.png)
## "PowerRouter has been a great addition to our tool stack for a number of reasons. It lives directly inside Salesforce so it connects seamlessly with our CRM. We were previously paying 4x the cost for the same or potentially less functionality. PowerRouter is a simple yet powerful and effective way to route sales leads." 
## Sam Rosenbaum
## Head of Enterprise Sales, UXPin 
![](https://powerrouter.io/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/jasmine-watts-removebg-preview-1.png)
## "PowerRouter has been a perfect lead assignment solution. It has saved a lot of admin time and we anticipate increasing conversion rates leading to more sales"
## Jasmine Watts
## COO, Tahoe Mountain Realty 
![](https://powerrouter.io/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/1553023609263-removebg-preview.png)
## PowerRouter has helped us solve one of our important business needs in Salesforce. This tool ended up solving our round robin needs flawlessly!
## Edward Glenbockie
## Sales Operations Manager, Emtrain.
![](https://powerrouter.io/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/8b027433ec0536877de6ce94620ad418-1.png)
## "PowerRouter is the best lead routing tool in the industry right now. It effortlessly simplifies our MQL-based lead routing workflows, reducing MQL leakage by 80%. We rely on PowerRouter for all our lead routing needs to ensure the leads land in the hands of the right sales teams."
## Nick Lauricella
## Sr. Marketing Operations Manager, Cockroach Labs
## One-click solution for effortless lead routing workflows
  * Routing Pro
  * ABX Orchestration
  * Data Management


## Get to buyers faster. Stop revenue leaks
Efficient workflows lead to better outcomes. Customize complex workflows within _**minutes**_ , not days. Match qualified leads to the right accounts easily with instant lead-to-account matching.
![](https://powerrouter.io/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/Routing-pro-1.png)
## Avoid confusion. Connect with right accounts, everytime
Spend less time qualifying, more time engaging the right accounts. Know who owns an account instantly – no double-assigning, no duplicated efforts. Create custom rules of engagement on a fly to win more accounts.
![](https://powerrouter.io/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/ABX-Orchestration.webp)
### Don't let bad data put your revenue at risk
## Eliminate duplicates in your CRM and watch your sales productivity improve 2X. PowerRouter automatically double-checks every record across the entire CRM database. Identify and merge duplicate records in real-time to ensure accurate data and save time.
![](https://powerrouter.io/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/Data-management-3.webp)
## Revenue leaks are hard to track. Stop them from happening
75% of the prospects buy from the vendor that responds first. Respond to your leads within 5 minutes to 9x your chances of qualifying
## Convert deals before they slip away
Connect hot leads to your qualified reps instantly for faster conversions. Track pipeline activity in real-time to keep an eye on revenue progress and take quick action to improve sales efficiency.
![](https://powerrouter-new-2f639d.ingress-baronn.ewp.live/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/Sales-persona-image-home-page-2-4.svg)
![](https://powerrouter.io/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/Lead-journey.webp)
![](https://powerrouter-new-2f639d.ingress-baronn.ewp.live/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/Group-258-1.svg)
![](https://powerrouter.io/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/Group-978-1.png)
Every MQL is a potential sale. Never let one go unnoticed.
## Boost marketing revenue with faster MQL and demo form conversions 
Prioritize high-intent MQLs based on MQL score. Assign hot MQLs and demo leads to the right reps instantly for faster conversions. Get sales teams to act faster on high-potential MQLs and demo form leads instantly. 
Sales teams rely on 10+ tools in their tech stack, resulting in underutilized sales potential and siloed data
## Siloed data + misaligned teams = lost revenue 
Take charge of your data and teams with one easy-to-use tool. Enable your sales and marketing teams to manage sales deals collaboratively with smart handoffs. Effortlessly manage all your leads from one place to gain control over your revenue funnel. 
![](https://powerrouter.io/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/Rules-of-Engagement-1.png)
![](https://powerrouter.io/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/Case-routing.png)
Customers expect responses within 15 minutes but the average wait time is 12 hours
## Improve customer experience with quick speed-to-customer
Better customer experiences drive better retention. Go beyond conversions with experience-driven routing workflows. Make sure your CS teams connect with customers at the right times. Ensure quick resolution, improve customer satisfaction, and reduce churn.
## Your source of truth for lead routing
Unify your data, processes, and tools within Salesforce
![](https://powerrouter.io/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/Frame_24-1.gif)
## Trending Resources
You may find these resources useful
[![](https://powerrouter.io/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/Lead-to-account-matching-in-Salesforce.png)](https://www.powerrouter.io/<https:/powerrouter.io/lead-to-account-matching-in-salesforce-quick-and-easy-way/>)
###  [ Lead to Account Matching in Salesforce, Quick and Easy Way ](https://www.powerrouter.io/<https:/powerrouter.io/lead-to-account-matching-in-salesforce-quick-and-easy-way/>)
Picture this: You are running a successful outbound sales campaign, and one of your leads from those efforts unexpectedly comes through your inbound route. This lead is then assigned to one of your inbound SDRs. The catch is, your inbound team is unaware of the prior outreach by your outbound team and reached out to the prospect with curiosity. 
[ Read More » ](https://www.powerrouter.io/<https:/powerrouter.io/lead-to-account-matching-in-salesforce-quick-and-easy-way/>)
[![](https://powerrouter.io/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/Lead-Assignment-in-Salesforce.png)](https://www.powerrouter.io/<https:/powerrouter.io/the-easiest-way-to-do-lead-assignment-in-salesforce/>)
###  [ The Easiest Way to do Lead Assignment in Salesforce ](https://www.powerrouter.io/<https:/powerrouter.io/the-easiest-way-to-do-lead-assignment-in-salesforce/>)
Lead generation is a top priority for 50% of marketers. On average, organizations generate an impressive 1,877 leads per month. Unfortunately, only 27% of them get contacted, which means companies are allowing 71% of their hard-earned leads to leak through the cracks, leaving valuable revenue on the table.
[ Read More » ](https://www.powerrouter.io/<https:/powerrouter.io/the-easiest-way-to-do-lead-assignment-in-salesforce/>)
[![](https://powerrouter.io/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/Weighted-RR-PR-blog-3.png)](https://www.powerrouter.io/<https:/powerrouter.io/the-best-way-to-manage-remote-teams-in-salesforce-for-improved-sales-productivity/>)
###  [ The Best Way to Manage Remote Teams in Salesforce for Improved Sales Productivity ](https://www.powerrouter.io/<https:/powerrouter.io/the-best-way-to-manage-remote-teams-in-salesforce-for-improved-sales-productivity/>)
According to HubSpot’s global sales trends report, 67% of sales reps are now operating remotely or in a hybrid setting. The trend is even more significant worldwide, with 70% of sales teams embracing remote work. However, 67% of sales managers find managing remote teams more challenging than expected. 
[ Read More » ](https://www.powerrouter.io/<https:/powerrouter.io/the-best-way-to-manage-remote-teams-in-salesforce-for-improved-sales-productivity/>)

Take action today and book a 30-minute FREE demo

generated_description:
### PowerRouter: Streamlining Sales Lead Management

**Website:** [powerrouter.io](https://www.powerrouter.io)  
**Founded:** 2021 (Y Combinator Batch W21)  
**Location:** Austin, TX  
**Team Size:** 3 employees  
**Group Partner:** Brad Flora

---

**Mission:**  
PowerRouter is crafted to enhance lead routing within Salesforce, ensuring that sales teams can swiftly assign leads and contacts to the right representatives. The company's automation engine features an intuitive drag-and-drop canvas for creating routing rules visually. By providing actionable insights, PowerRouter significantly boosts the speed at which leads are handled, thereby improving account-based sales capabilities.

---

**What They Do:**  
Initially focused solely on lead and contact assignment, PowerRouter now offers a suite of products designed to automate and optimize lead routing workflows. Key functionalities include:

- **Routing Pro:** Streamlined tools for lead assignment that prevent confusion and enhance accountability.
- **Data Management:** Automated duplicate detection to maintain data integrity and improve sales efficiency.
- **ABX Orchestration:** Customizable workflows that ensure leads are directed to the optimal accounts without overlap.
- **Dynamic Territories & Power Pipeline:** Solutions to match leads with the right accounts effortlessly.

The emphasis is on creating a seamless experience within Salesforce, where businesses can integrate these tools and watch their sales efficiency soar.

---

**Value Proposition:**  
PowerRouter is about more than just automation—it's about eliminating revenue leaks. Companies that engage with PowerRouter can expect:

- **Faster Responses:** Speed is crucial; quickly addressing leads increases conversion potential dramatically.
- **Data Accuracy:** Avoiding duplicates can double sales productivity, making it easier for teams to focus on engaging with potential customers.
- **User-Friendly Interface:** Complex workflows can be established in minutes, not days, enabling teams to pivot quickly in today’s fast-paced market.

---

**Customer Testimonials:**  
PowerRouter has garnered positive feedback from various industry leaders. Users report not only enhanced efficiency but also a significant reduction in lead leakage. With features that seamlessly integrate into existing Salesforce setups, clients express gratitude for the time saved and remarkable improvements in their sales processes.

---

PowerRouter is setting a new standard for sales teams navigating the complexities of modern CRM systems. By focusing on lead routing and operational efficiency, they empower businesses to convert leads more effectively and collaboratively, all within the familiar environment of Salesforce. 

If you’re looking to supercharge your lead management, you might want to [book a demo](https://www.powerrouter.io/free-demo/) and see how PowerRouter can energize your sales efforts.
